content: Enjoyed reading your piece Ash Buchanan and your reflection Sam Rye. Thank you for sharing — would love to continue this conversation in some way. Am currently doing the uLab course and diving into Theory U — one of the best social processes I have found so far that really bridges inner work and outer work. So effectively captures the idea that “the ‘success’ of a changemaker depends on the inner place from which they operate”. Would love to pick your brains/hearts and hear your thoughts on how we can weave more of this into Live the Dream this year!
